Awesome Vibe Coding !Awesomehttps://awesome.re <!-- omit in toc --> > A curated list of vibe coding references, collaborating with AI to write code. English | PortuguÃªs | í•œêµ­ì–´ | ä¸­æ–‡ | æ—¥æœ¬èªž Contents <!-- omit in toc --> - About the concept - Browser-based Tools - IDEs and Code Editors - Plugins and Extensions - Command Line Tools - Documentation for AI Coding - News and Social Media - Contribute About the concept - Andrej Karpathy on X - "There's a new kind of coding I call "vibe coding", where you fully give in to the vibes, embrace exponentials, and forget that the code even exists. . I'm building a project or webapp, but it's not really coding - I just see stuff, say stuff, run stuff, and copy paste stuff, and it mostly works". - automata/aicodeguide - A roadmap to start coding with AI. Browser-based Tools - ðŸ”¥ Bolt.new - Prompt, run, edit, and deploy full-stack web and mobile apps. - ðŸ”¥ Lovable - "Idea to app in seconds. Lovable is your superhuman full stack engineer". - ðŸ”¥ v0 by Vercel - Assistant to build NextJS frontend. - Capacity - "Capacity lets you turn your ideas into fully functional web apps in minutes using AI.". - CHAI.new by Langbase - Prompt to vibe code any AI agent and deploy agent, app, api - Replit - "Simply describe your idea above and let the Agent build it for you". - Create - "Turn your words into sites, tools, apps, and products". - Trickle AI - "Build stunning websites, AI apps, and forms with ease". - Tempo - "Build React apps 10x faster with AI". - Softgen - "Describe your vision, give instructions, and build full-stack web apps". - Lazy AI - "Build reliable business apps with prompts". - HeyBoss - "Build app & sites in minutes". - Creatr - "Create and deploy web apps and landing pages in seconds". - Rork - "Build any mobile app, fast". - Firebase Studio - Google's agentic cloud-based development environment that helps build and ship production-quality full-stack AI apps. - Napkins.dev - Screenshot to code - HeroUI Chat - Generate beautiful apps regardless of your design experience. - Rocket.new - "Build Web & Mobile Apps 10x Faster Without Code". IDEs and Code Editors - Windsurf Editor by Codeium - Agentic IDE, "where the work of developers and AI truly flow together, allowing for a coding experience that feels like literal magic". - ðŸ”¥ Cursor - AI Code Editor, "the best way to code with AI". - Zed - Code editor designed for high-performance collaboration with humans and AI. - Amazon Kiro https://kiro.dev - The AI IDE for prototype to production. Mobile Apps - VibeCode - The app that builds apps. Plugins and Extensions - Cline - AI assistant that can use your CLI aNd Editor, for VS Code. - Roo Code - Fork of cline with extra features/enhancements - avante.nvim - Neovim plugin designed to emulate the behavior of the Cursor AI IDE. It provides AI-driven code suggestions and allows you to apply recommendations directly to your source files with minimal effort. - backnotprop/prompt-tower - A tool that helps you build prompts with many code blocks. - Augment Code - An AI coding assistant built for professional software engineers and large codebases. - continuedev/continue: Build, share, and use custom AI code assistants with our open-source IDE extensions and library of models, prompts, rules, and docs. - GitHub Copilot - An AI designed to help you coding faster in Visual Studio Code. It offers code completion, chats with the AI models and an agent mode for agentic coding - Amazon Q Developer â€“ AWS - Amazon's Generative AI Assistant for Software Development. - Superdesign.dev - Open Source Design Agent. Local Apps - Dyad - Free, local, open-source AI app builder Command Line Tools - ðŸ”¥ anthropics/claude-code - Coding agent that understands your codebase, automates tasks, explains code, and manages git, all via natural language. - aider - AI pair programming in your terminal. - codename goose - Local, on-machine AI Agent that allows you to use any LLM and add any MCP servers as extensions - MyCoder.ai - Open source AI-powered coding assistant with Git and GitHub integration, featuring parallel execution and self-modification capabilities. - ai-christianson/RA.Aid - A standalone coding agent built on LangGraph's agent-based task execution framework - CodeSelect - A Python-based command-line tool that efficiently communicates project source code to AIs. - OpenAI Codex CLI - OpenAI's lightweight coding agent that runs in the terminal - Gemini CLI - An open-source AI agent from Google that brings the power of Gemini directly into your terminal. - QwenLM/qwen-code - "qwen-code is a coding agent that lives in digital world". - opencode - "AI coding agent built for the terminal". Task Management for AI Coding - Boomerang Tasks - Automatically break down complex projects into smaller, manageable pieces. - Claude Task Master - An AI-powered task-management system you can drop into Cursor, Lovable, Windsurf, Roo, and others. Documentation for AI Coding - CodeGuide - Creates detailed Documentation for your AI Coding Projects. News and Social Media > This section displays items in reverse chronological order, with the most recent entries at the top. - The Prompt Engineering Playbook for Programmers - What is vibe coding?
